alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McPherson County through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inman. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Moundridge and Inman. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 43 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
